title: Shinpai-sei de Ichizuna Kanojo Ga Boku O Zenzen Akiramenai - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Shy Characters   Stalkers   Younger Sisters
author: Maromi Maroyaka   丸深まろやか
description:
Aoto Sakuraba… the definition of a high school student devoted to a peaceful and free life. What he never expected was for Shizuno to come crashing down so suddenly into his life.

Shizuno Yuunagi… the dream girl well-known for an alluring appearance, exceptional grades, and a burning passion towards Aoto. Aoto, who refuses to love, denies her confession. However, Yuunagi will not back down and will make him hers.

“I’ll do anything! Please!”

”Well …”

In the end, Aoto, who could not ignore her, decided to start a relationship with Shizuno.

”But why did you do that?”

“Uh … that’s …”

The perfect girl Shizuno was impatient. She, who kept observing him, came to a conclusion. Surely, “Aoto Sakuraba is secretly popular.”

This is a youth romantic comedy about a boy who is unconsciously popular and a beautiful girl who wants to monopolize him.>
